title: New: Tears & Marble – We Don't Like You
body:
Having turned **Haddaway’s** classic [What Is Love](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/25766-video-tears-marble-love-haddaway-cover/) into a slow burning, blog-friendly hit, Dutch duo **Tears & Marble** return with their first original track, _We Don’t Like You_. Equally as dark and foreboding, there’s touches of Warpaint and Grimes, in the moody vocals and unforgiving chorus. Check it out below.

excerpt.full: Having turned Haddaway’s classic What Is Love into a slow burning, blog-friendly hit, Dutch duo Tears & Marble return with their first original track, We Don’t Like You. Equally as dark and foreboding, there’s touches of Warpaint and Grimes, in the moody vocals and unforgiving chorus. Check it out below.
